text.author: Maureen F. McHugh
text.title: The Cost to Be Wise
text.summary: While gunfire can be heard outside, a protagonist on an extraterrestrial colony that had been forgotten by Earth spends a night with Veronique, the daughter of an anthropologist from Earth who is studying the rediscovered colony's people, before falling asleep and dreaming of being a hero on Earth.
